bibl.title: Philadelphus' Alexandria as Cradle of Biblical Historiography.
bibl.note: Aristeas. - Other Alexandrian scholars. - Dead Sea scrolls. - Recensions of biblical historical books in Greek. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Ptolemy II Philadelphus and his World

bibl.seg: GUILLAUME Philippe, Philadelphus' Alexandria as Cradle of Biblical Historiography.
Paul McKECHNIE and Philippe GUILLAUME (Edd.), Ptolemy II Philadelphus and his World = Mnemosyne. Supplementum 300 (Leiden, 2008) pp. 247-255.
Aristeas. - Other Alexandrian scholars. - Dead Sea scrolls. - Recensions of biblical historical books in Greek. - Conclusion.
